Name: Two-One-Two (212)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Earthy taste with freshness coming from the grapefruit.
History: Created in 2008 by Willy Shine at Contemporary Cocktails Inc. in New York City. The name is a reference to NYC's 212 area code as well as the ounces in the recipe. Willy is also the Partida Tequila Ambassador for NYC so I should point out that this is the brand originally called for in his recipe.
Nutrition: One serving of Two-One-Two (212) contains 226 calories
